page.title: 12SPECTATOR SPORTS-AUCHINLECK
page.content: There are two main spectator sports in Auchinleck; football and greyhound racing. The football team, Auchinleck Talbot,were founded in 1890's and have in their history won the top honour, The Scottish Junior Cup in 1949.They have a strong support in the village and have been very successful in recent years .Their home ground is Beechwood Park. The Greyhound Stadium lies to the west of the village and holds race meetings twice weekly.It was built in 1956 and attracts racing dogs and spectators from within a radius of 50 to 60 miles.
